text: Joanna Frank (born Johanna Bochco; March 7, 1941) is an American actress. Her first role was in Elia Kazan's 1963 movie America, America. She was also in the cult biker movie The Savage Seven (1968) and the romantic comedy Say Anything... (1989). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Manhattan
title: Joanna Frank
